disclaimer.service: TrueCar operates this information website ("Service") featuring pricing, performance, technical, and safety data available for new and used vehicles. The Service is not available in all locations.
disclaimer.location: The Service may not be available in your particular location.
disclaimer.brokerSell: TrueCar does not broker, sell or lease motor vehicles. Each Certified Dealer sets its own pricing, and will confirm actual vehicle availability from in-stock inventory, including options and color choices.
disclaimer.tcCopyright: © and ™ TrueCar, Inc. All rights reserved.
disclaimer.averageSavings: Between 7/1/18 and 9/30/18, the average savings off MSRP presented by TrueCar Certified Dealers to users of TrueCar powered websites based on users who received in-stock price offers and who TrueCar identified as purchasing a new vehicle of the same make and model as one of the in-stock price offers from a Certified Dealer as of 10/31/18, was $3,402. Your actual savings may vary based on multiple factors including the vehicle you select, region, dealer, and applicable vehicle specific manufacturer incentives which are subject to change. The MSRP is determined by the manufacturer, and may not reflect the price at which vehicles are generally sold in the dealer’s trade area as not all vehicles are sold at MSRP. Each dealer sets its own pricing.
disclaimer.subscriberDiscount: Subscriber Discounts not available on all cars or in all states. To obtain a Subscriber Discount, you must present your Guaranteed Price Certificate to your Dealer Representative upon arrival at the Dealer. Subscriber Discounts are provided by participating Dealers and not by the Auto Buying Service or TrueCar. Subscriber Discount expires 14 days after production of your Guaranteed Price Certificate.
disclaimer.consumerReportsGeneral: The Consumer Reports Build & Buy Car Buying Service (the "Service") is provided to Consumer Reports subscribers by TrueCar.com. TrueCar operates the Service’s dealer network and substantial portions of the Service’s website. Consumers Union collects a fee from TrueCar in connection with the Service. Consumers Union applies these fees to fund our testing programs. Consumers Union has no financial relationship with any dealer.

nodes.name: Midsize Vans with Best Gas Mileage
Best Midsize Vans for the Money
Full Size Vans with Best Gas Mileage
Best Full Size Vans for the Money

Model:TW9kZWwtMTE2NjU=.name: Transit Passenger Wagon

editorial({\"section\":\"OVERVIEW\"}).text: The Ford Transit Passenger Wagon is an excellent choice for those seeking a comfortable passenger van that boasts an impressive array of safety features and connectivity options, all at a great value. With a variety of body sizes, roof heights, and drivetrains to choose from, there's something for everyone. Inside, the van is both spacious and quiet, capable of carrying up to 15 people and their belongings with ease. Additionally, the Transit Passenger Wagon is a pleasure to drive, thanks to its two powerful engine options and sharp handling.

Model:TW9kZWwtMTE2NjU=.overview: The Ford Transit Passenger Wagon utilizes a commercial-grade platform to comfortably transport up to 15 passengers. Its interior is well-appointed for extended journeys, featuring premium cloth upholstery, a Wi-Fi hotspot, and advanced driver-assistance technology.

editorial({\"section\":\"VERDICT\"}).text: With the ability to accommodate up to 15 passengers and their belongings, the Ford Transit Passenger Wagon is the preferred choice for shuttle businesses. Its serene cabin and state-of-the-art features ensure it is always ready for any task at hand.

editorial({\"section\":\"PROS\"}).title: Pros
editorial({\"section\":\"PROS\"}).text: Transports up to 15 passengers in comfort. Robust engines and refined handling. Advanced technology that's easy to use.

editorial({\"section\":\"CONS\"}).title: Cons
editorial({\"section\":\"CONS\"}).text: The base infotainment screen is small. Limited towing capacity. Higher starting price than some rivals.

Model:TW9kZWwtMTE2NjY=.name: Transit Cargo Van

editorial({\"section\":\"OVERVIEW\"}).text:
Full-size vans offer unrivaled covered cargo-carrying abilities, making them ideal for a wide range of business applications, and the 2024 Ford Transit Cargo Van is a top pick. It stands out from rivals with a car-like ride, well-equipped cabin, and excellent standard safety features. Ford offers several body sizes, with plumbing, HVAC, delivery services, catering, and general contracting configurations. The interior can even be set up as a mobile office. All-wheel drive is available, making the Transit a popular option for camping. Ford's two available engines are based on its 3.5-liter V6, offering class-leading power and refinement.

There are some areas where the Transit lags the segment. Ford doesn't offer a diesel like some rivals. Towing and payload are also lower than other models. Still, the Transit should provide more than enough strength for most applications.

There is a handful of vans to choose from in the full-size category, and while the Ford Transit is one of the best, its rivals have their strengths. The [Mercedes-Benz Sprinter Cargo Van](/mercedes-benz/sprinter-cargo-van/) lives up to its name with prestige, luxury, and refinement. The [Chevrolet Express Cargo Van](/chevrolet/express-cargo-van/) and its mechanical twin, the [GMC Savana Cargo Van](/gmc/savana-cargo-van/), offer truck-like towing capacities. The [Ram ProMaster Cargo Van](/ram/promaster-cargo-van/) dishes out vast cargo space, a super-tall roof, and a hefty payload rating.

Model:TW9kZWwtMTE2NjY=.overview: With sales exceeding eight million units, the Ford Transit serves as a prime example of efficient transportation tailored to diverse business needs. Its interior offers a versatile canvas for customization, while Ford's state-of-the-art safety features provide assurance on extended journeys.

editorial({\"section\":\"VERDICT\"}).text: The Ford Transit Cargo Van provides a heavy-duty platform with several body lengths and roof heights to help businesses find the right vehicle for any job. The Transit shines on the open road with a smooth ride, comfortable cabin, and excellent driver-assistance technology, though some rivals offer more off-road capability and luxury features.

editorial({\"section\":\"PROS\"}).title: Pros
editorial({\"section\":\"PROS\"}).text: Ready to take on jobs of all sizes. Torquey available turbocharged engine. Spacious and well-equipped interior. Ford's driver-assistance tech leads the segment.

editorial({\"section\":\"CONS\"}).title: Cons
editorial({\"section\":\"CONS\"}).text: Subpar towing capacity. Upper trim levels can get expensive.

Model:TW9kZWwtMTE2NjE=.name: eSprinter Cargo Van
Model:TW9kZWwtMTE2NjE=.overallAssessment: Cargo vans are rarely game-changers, but the Mercedes-Benz eSprinter Cargo Van fits the bill. The eSprinter delivers up to 249 miles of electric range without emissions or any sacrifices to power or carrying capacity. It has one of the most stylish cabins in its class, with elegant design cues and top-notch materials. Rivals deliver similar cargo abilities and technology at a lower price. Still, the eSprinter is one of the most appealing cargo vans on the market, offering class-leading EV range, the refinement of a Mercedes-Benz, and upscale interior options.

editorial({\"section\":\"OVERVIEW\"}).text: Cargo vans can rarely be called game changers, but the Mercedes-Benz eSprinter Cargo Van fits the bill. The eSprinter delivers up to 249 miles of electric range without emissions or any sacrifices to power or carrying capacity. It has one of the most stylish cabins in its class, with elegant design cues and top-notch materials. Rivals deliver similar cargo abilities and technology at a lower price. Still, the eSprinter is one of the most appealing cargo vans on the market, offering class-leading EV range, the refinement of a Mercedes-Benz, and upscale interior options.

Model:TW9kZWwtMTE2NjE=.overview: The 2024 Mercedes-Benz eSprinter Cargo Van is the final say in fleet efficiency, a rugged full-size van with an electric powertrain capable of traveling up to 249 miles on a full charge. Other EV vans on the market can't match the eSprinter's range, but the eSprinter is also the most expensive option in its segment.

editorial({\"section\":\"VERDICT\"}).text: The 2024 Mercedes-Benz eSprinter Cargo Van is the final say in fleet efficiency, a rugged full-size van with an electric powertrain capable of traveling up to 249 miles on a full charge. Other EV vans on the market can't match the eSprinter's range, but the eSprinter is also the most expensive option in its segment.

pros: Excellent electric driving range. Herculean cargo space and payload. Top-notch comfort and available technology. In-house upfit solutions.
cons: Only one body size available. Base model could come with more features for the price.

editorial({\"section\":\"PROS\"}).title: Pros
editorial({\"section\":\"PROS\"}).text: Excellent electric driving range. Herculean cargo space and payload. Top-notch comfort and available technology. In-house upfit solutions.

editorial({\"section\":\"CONS\"}).title: Cons
editorial({\"section\":\"CONS\"}).text: Only one body size available. Base model could come with more features for the price.

Model:TW9kZWwtMTIwMDE=.name: Carnival
Model:TW9kZWwtMTIwMDE=.overview: The Kia Carnival minivan boasts a spacious and cleverly designed interior that outclasses most SUVs for passenger and cargo capacity. With its sleek design, you won't have to compromise style for incredible functionality.

Model:TW9kZWwtMTE2NjQ=.name: E-Transit Cargo Van

editorial({\"section\":\"OVERVIEW\"}).text: The 2024 Ford E-Transit injects a welcome dose of modernity into the full-size cargo van segment. This electric vehicle boasts excellent power and a respectable driving range, making it ideal for companies seeking to reduce fuel costs and their environmental impact. While its range doesn't quite match gas-powered rivals, the E-Transit compensates with its emissions-free operation and class-leading technology. It's a versatile workhorse offered in multiple configurations to suit diverse business needs. Rivals include the [Ram ProMaster EV](/ram/promaster-ev/) and [Mercedes-Benz eSprinter Cargo Van](/mercedes-benz/esprinter-cargo-van/).

Model:TW9kZWwtMTE2NjQ=.overview: The Ford E-Transit Cargo Van provides the same versatility as Ford's other van models but distinguishes itself with an all-electric driving range of 126 miles and the option for an onboard power generator.

editorial({\"section\":\"VERDICT\"}).text: The E-Transit Cargo Van stands out with its all-electric driving range and innovative features. It offers a spacious cargo area, a suite of cutting-edge driver-assistance technology, and the option for an onboard power generator, making it a compelling choice for eco-conscious businesses.

editorial({\"section\":\"PROS\"}).title: Pros
editorial({\"section\":\"PROS\"}).text: Powerful electric motor for efficient performance. Spacious cargo area with flexible configurations. Less expensive than other EV vans.

editorial({\"section\":\"CONS\"}).title: Cons
editorial({\"section\":\"CONS\"}).text: Limited electric driving range. No all-wheel-drive option available.

Model:TW9kZWwtMTE2NDM=.name: Sienna

editorial({\"section\":\"OVERVIEW\"}).text:
Minivans are often overlooked in today's race for supreme fuel economy. Aerodynamic wedge-shaped cars now reach 50 mpg or more thanks to hybrid systems, while most minivans lumber along with strong, if not particularly efficient, V6 engines. The 2024 Toyota Sienna is changing that. Toyota applies its hybrid wisdom to the Sienna with a four-cylinder engine and a pair of electric motors that make it today's most fuel-efficient minivan, earning 36 mpg in combined city and highway driving.

The Sienna also offers all-wheel drive, another minivan rarity, simply by adding a third electric motor to the rear wheels. This makes the Sienna an ideal choice for wet-weather climates. Combine that with an upscale interior trimmed in quality materials, precise fit-and-finish, and plenty of handy features (hands-free-opening side doors, several active safety aids), and you have a solid family vehicle.

The Sienna falls short of its rivals on a couple of counts, though. Despite its impressive fuel efficiency, the four-cylinder engine feels and sounds taxed when accelerating from already high speeds. And unlike competitors such as the [Honda Odyssey](/honda/odyssey/) and [Kia Carnival](/kia/carnival/), the Sienna doesn't have removable second-row seats, which hampers versatility and overall cargo space. These needn't be deal-breakers, though. Storage isn't the only use for a minivan, and drivers can plan when merging or passing to offset the Sienna's underwhelming highway power. Even with a few flaws, the Toyota Sienna is a solid choice for a stylish and efficient domestic shuttle.

Model:TW9kZWwtMTE2NDM=.overview: The Toyota Sienna seats eight passengers with ease, making it a great choice for families needing more room than an SUV. Fuel economy is excellent, thanks to the Sienna’s standard hybrid powertrain, and all-wheel drive is available for peace of mind in bad weather.

editorial({\"section\":\"VERDICT\"}).text: Toyota brings its mastery of hybrid systems to the 2024 Sienna, making it today's most fuel-efficient minivan. A classy interior and plenty of useful features make it an ideal family shuttle, but it lacks power and provides less overall cargo space than rivals.

editorial({\"section\":\"PROS\"}).title: Pros
editorial({\"section\":\"PROS\"}).text: Best-in-class fuel efficiency. Optional all-wheel drive. Adventure-ready Woodland Edition.

editorial({\"section\":\"CONS\"}).title: Cons
editorial({\"section\":\"CONS\"}).text: Stationary second-row seats limit utility and cargo space. Less horsepower than rivals.

editorial({\"section\":\"OVERVIEW\"}).text:
Once the go-to family car, the minivan has largely been pushed aside by popular crossover SUVs. Too bad, because there is no better vehicle on the road for comfortably transporting people and cargo, and the 2024 Chrysler Pacifica is a prime example of how to do it right.

With few minivans left on the market, the Pacifica competes directly with the [Honda Odyssey](/honda/odyssey/), [Toyota Sienna](/toyota/sienna/), and [Kia Carnival](/kia/carnival/). Of these, the Pacifica is the only one to offer a plug-in hybrid powertrain, which is a significant advantage. A full charge will deliver approximately 32 miles of electric-only driving range, and even after the battery is depleted, the hybrid Pacifica is still at least as efficient as its gas-only rivals.

While the Pacifica Hybrid certainly has its advantages, the non-hybrid V6-equipped Pacifica also brings a lot to the road, including available all-wheel drive and seating for up to eight passengers. Chrysler introduced its Stow 'n Go seats many years ago, and that feature continues in the non-hybrid Pacific, allowing the second-row seats to fold into the floor for maximized cargo space.

Chrysler also offers the Pacifica, with a range of convenient features and technology designed to keep the minivan relevant in today's market.

editorial({\"section\":\"VERDICT\"}).text: The 2024 Chrysler Pacifica excels at moving cargo and people in a comfortable, spacious cabin with the option of a fuel-efficient plug-in hybrid powertrain or the versatility of all-wheel drive.

editorial({\"section\":\"PROS\"}).title: Pros
editorial({\"section\":\"PROS\"}).text: Fuel-efficient plug-in hybrid model. Spacious interior. Intuitive infotainment system.

editorial({\"section\":\"CONS\"}).title: Cons
editorial({\"section\":\"CONS\"}).text: All-wheel drive is not available in hybrid plug-in. Eight-passenger seating only for the standard gas model.

Model:TW9kZWwtMTEzOTk=.name: Sprinter Passenger Van

editorial({\"section\":\"OVERVIEW\"}).text: For those in search of a spacious vehicle capable of transporting more passengers than a minivan or SUV, the Mercedes-Benz Sprinter Passenger Van is worth considering. This versatile van accommodates up to 15 passengers with ease, whether driving on smooth pavement or off-road. Equipped with diesel powertrains, the Sprinter also offers luxurious features not commonly found in a van, as one would expect from a Mercedes-Benz. With its top-of-the-line cabin materials and engineering, the Sprinter stands out among competitors like the [Ford Transit Passenger Wagon](/ford/transit-passenger-wagon/) and [GMC Savana Passenger](/gmc/savana-passenger/). While the Sprinter comes with a higher price tag, it provides the best refinement and technology within its class.

Model:TW9kZWwtMTEzOTk=.overview: The Mercedes-Benz Sprinter Passenger Van offers plush transportation for up to 15 passengers. It boasts a rugged platform that performs well off-road.

editorial({\"section\":\"VERDICT\"}).text: With a sturdy chassis that excels on rugged terrain, the Mercedes-Benz Sprinter Passenger Van offers luxurious transportation for up to 15 passengers.

editorial({\"section\":\"PROS\"}).title: Pros
editorial({\"section\":\"PROS\"}).text: Impressive interior space and refinement. Class-leading amenities. More luxury and prestige than a typical van. Good for light off-roading.

editorial({\"section\":\"CONS\"}).title: Cons
editorial({\"section\":\"CONS\"}).text: Higher priced than rivals. No gas engine available. Driver-assistance technology costs extra.

Model:TW9kZWwtMTEzOTg=.name: Sprinter Cargo Van
Model:TW9kZWwtMTEzOTg=.overallAssessment: The Mercedes-Benz Sprinter Cargo Van is a full-size commercial vehicle with up to 533 cubic feet of cargo space, which can be customized for nearly any job. It makes a great foundation for a recreational vehicle, thanks to its technology, refinement, and strength. The Ford Transit offers all-wheel drive and almost as much interior space for a lower price, while the GMC Savana Cargo Van and Chevrolet Express can tow an impressive 10,000 pounds. Still, Mercedes-Benz offers the best tech amenities in its segment, with optional heated seats, wireless phone charging, and a 10.25-inch touchscreen.

editorial({\"section\":\"OVERVIEW\"}).text: The 2024 Mercedes-Benz Sprinter Cargo Van offers up to 533 cubic feet of cargo capacity, making it versatile for a range of industries. The Sprinter has long been a top choice for recreational vehicle retrofitters, with a comfortable interior and a foundation of technology, refinement, and strength to handle any environment. Mercedes-Benz offers the best tech amenities in its segment, with available heated seats, wireless smartphone charging, and a superb 10.25-inch touchscreen.

Model:TW9kZWwtMTEzOTg=.overview: The Mercedes-Benz Sprinter is one of the most rugged and refined cargo vans on the market. It brings the luxury automaker's premium touch to the commercial category, albeit at a higher price than rivals.

editorial({\"section\":\"VERDICT\"}).text: The Mercedes-Benz Sprinter Cargo Van is the most refined and luxurious of the full-size commercial vans, making the daily commute or delivery route much more relaxing. There are dozens of ways to personalize the Sprinter's platform to your business, with a wide array of engines, body lengths, roof heights, and industry-specific options.

pros: Powerful diesel engine. High-end cabin and technology. Incredible cargo space.
cons: The most expensive van in its class. Rivals offer more powertrain options.

editorial({\"section\":\"PROS\"}).title: Pros
editorial({\"section\":\"PROS\"}).text: Powerful diesel engine. High-end cabin and technology. Incredible cargo space.

editorial({\"section\":\"CONS\"}).title: Cons
editorial({\"section\":\"CONS\"}).text: The most expensive van in its class.

Model:TW9kZWwtMTEzOTc=.name: Sprinter Crew Van

editorial({\"section\":\"OVERVIEW\"}).text: Few vans offer as much cargo and passenger flexibility as the Mercedes-Benz Sprinter Crew Van. Its five-passenger cabin and vast cargo capacity make it an ideal platform for everything from a corporate shuttle to a recreational vehicle and everything in between. It's essentially a hybrid between the Mercedes-Benz Sprinter Cargo Van and the Sprinter Passenger Van, offering the best of both worlds for those needing such a vehicle. Most cargo vans cost less, and some are even offered with optional back seats, but they are not as comfortable. The Sprinter Crew Van is available with all-wheel drive, making it one of the best options out there as an off-road RV. Advanced driver-assistance features are available, though the price can add up quickly. Rivals include the [Chevrolet Express Cargo Van](/chevrolet/express-cargo-van/), [Ford Transit Cargo Van](/ford/transit-cargo-van/), and [Ram ProMaster Cargo Van](/ram/promaster-cargo-van/).

Model:TW9kZWwtMTEzOTc=.overview: Setting it apart from conventional cargo vans, the Mercedes-Benz Sprinter Crew Van features a rear seat—a rarity in its class. This unique configuration allows the Crew Van to comfortably seat five passengers while retaining an impressive cargo capacity of up to 371 cubic feet.

editorial({\"section\":\"VERDICT\"}).text: The Mercedes-Benz Sprinter Crew Van merges passenger van comfort with substantial cargo capacity, offering a versatile, high-quality option for various business needs, though it commands a higher price than its competitors.

editorial({\"section\":\"PROS\"}).title: Pros
editorial({\"section\":\"PROS\"}).text: Easily accommodates passengers and cargo. Handles various road conditions with ease. Spirited performance. Class-leading engineering and refinement.

editorial({\"section\":\"CONS\"}).title: Cons
editorial({\"section\":\"CONS\"}).text: Higher price tag compared to similar large vans. Driver-assist features come at an additional cost.

Model:TW9kZWwtMTIwMzA=.name: Odyssey
Model:TW9kZWwtMTIwMzA=.overview: The Honda Odyssey is a minivan designed for families, offering a spacious and versatile interior, comfortable ride and handling, advanced technology features, strong safety ratings, and a refined driving experience. However, it is not as sporty as some competitors.

Model:TW9kZWwtMTEyMjM=.name: Metris Passenger Van
Model:TW9kZWwtMTEyMjM=.overallAssessment: The Mercedes-Benz Metris Passenger Van provides seating for up to eight people and a sturdy, heavy-duty platform for daily driving. Its refined powertrain and premium cabin materials put it at the top of the commercial van segment, but it's expensive, and many of today's minivans offer more interior space. A truck-like payload capacity and a turbocharged engine allow the Metris to carry large amounts of people and cargo without breaking a sweat. Mercedes-Benz has said it will discontinue the midsize Metris after 2023, leaving the full-size Sprinter as its only commercial van. The Metris can be outfitted with an impressive array of driver-assistance technology and even a few luxury items, but its infotainment system is small and Apple CarPlay isn't available. The Ford Transit Connect Wagon is cheaper and offers better infotainment options, but it's a smaller van and not quite as refined.
Model:TW9kZWwtMTEyMjM=.overview: The 2023 Mercedes-Benz Metris Passenger Van is a sturdy, smooth-riding mover of people and cargo, but some of its technology lags behind today's minivans.
pros: Heavy-duty platform with a high payload capacity. Refined interior. Available driver-assistance technology.
cons: Modern minivans offer more seating space. No other body types available. High starting price.

Model:TW9kZWwtMTExNDY=.name: Transit Connect Wagon
Model:TW9kZWwtMTExNDY=.overallAssessment: Compact and well-engineered, the Ford Transit Connect Wagon is a superb passenger vehicle. The smooth powertrain returns strong fuel economy numbers. Clever interior design provides space for people or oversized cargo. Ford's comfort and infotainment are best-in-class. Cabin materials and gadgets don't match modern minivans, but the value-priced Transit Connect Wagon remains one of the best vans on the market.
Model:TW9kZWwtMTExNDY=.overview: The Ford Transit Connect Wagon offers three rows of seating in a footprint smaller than a midsize sedan.
pros: Flexible seating configurations. Best-in-class infotainment. Doubles as a cargo hauler.
cons: Not as luxurious as a minivan. No hybrid. XL lacks some popular features.

Model:TW9kZWwtMTE1MTU=.name: ProMaster Cargo Van

editorial({\"section\":\"OVERVIEW\"}).text: While most van buyers opt for a minivan, some require a larger vehicle that can transport more than just passengers. This is where full-size cargo vans come into play, providing businesses with ample interior space and versatility that SUVs and pickups cannot offer. One such van that stands out in this category is the 2024 Ram ProMaster Cargo Van, thanks to its smooth powertrain, customizable configurations, and flat loading bay. It excels in delivering outstanding performance for a variety of purposes, be it delivery, work, or camping. The ProMaster Cargo Van's ample storage capacity, coupled with its attractive price point, make it a formidable competitor in the market, even though it lacks all-wheel drive like some of its rivals.

Model:TW9kZWwtMTE1MTU=.overview: The Ram ProMaster Cargo Van is a spacious, full-size work vehicle designed for efficiently transporting substantial cargo loads. It presents an excellent option for businesses due to its affordability and a wide range of available configurations.

editorial({\"section\":\"VERDICT\"}).text: Boasting ample room and intended for the transportation of hefty loads, the Ram ProMaster Cargo Van is a top-tier, full-size work vehicle. Its exceptional affordability, along with a plethora of possible configurations, make it an ideal choice for businesses in need of reliable transportation for substantial cargo.

editorial({\"section\":\"PROS\"}).title: Pros
editorial({\"section\":\"PROS\"}).text: Plenty of room for cargo. Comfortable, high-quality cabin. Good performance. Easy-to-use tech.

editorial({\"section\":\"CONS\"}).title: Cons
editorial({\"section\":\"CONS\"}).text: Rivals offer more off-road capability. Few driver aids come standard.

Model:TW9kZWwtMTE0ODA=.name: ProMaster Window Van
Model:TW9kZWwtMTE0ODA=.overview: The Ram ProMaster Window Van embodies versatility, a full-size commercial van catering to passengers and cargo with its spacious interior and diverse upfit options. The ProMaster doesn't compromise on technology, featuring amenities such as a Wi-Fi hotspot and optional wireless charging, enhancing productivity at the job site.

Model:TW9kZWwtMTE1MzE=.name: Savana Passenger

editorial({\"section\":\"OVERVIEW\"}).text: Haul a dozen passengers or tow nearly five tons – the 2024 GMC Savana Passenger tackles both tasks with ease. It boasts one of the most spacious interiors on the market, comfortably seating up to 15 with ample elbow room. Renowned for its durability and simple repairs, the Savana excels as a fleet vehicle, logging countless miles with minimal downtime. While the cabin prioritizes functionality over creature comforts, its truck-like towing capabilities outshine many competitors. The heavy-duty platform and 276-hp V6 powertrain can tackle any job, making it a great workhorse van. A burly V8 is available. However, the Savana's design hails from a bygone era, lacking the advanced tech and fuel efficiency of newer rivals. Despite its shortcomings, the Savana remains one of the toughest vans available.

Model:TW9kZWwtMTE1MzE=.overview: The 2024 GMC Savana Passenger offers one of the most spacious interiors available, comfortably accommodating up to 15 passengers with ample room for cargo. Known for its durability, it's a dependable choice for fleet vehicles that can endure endless shuttle miles, with a reputation for ease of repair if issues arise.

editorial({\"section\":\"VERDICT\"}).text: A stalwart of the passenger van segment, the GMC Savana Passenger offers impressive space, towing capacity, and durability. However, its aging platform means it lags behind rivals in technology and refinement.

editorial({\"section\":\"PROS\"}).title: Pros
editorial({\"section\":\"PROS\"}).text: Seats up to 15 passengers comfortably. Ample in-cabin storage. Renowned for heavy-duty reliability.

editorial({\"section\":\"CONS\"}).title: Cons
editorial({\"section\":\"CONS\"}).text: Outdated interior design. Limited driver-assistance features. No all-wheel-drive option available.

Model:TW9kZWwtMTE1MzA=.name: Express Passenger

editorial({\"section\":\"OVERVIEW\"}).text: The Chevrolet Express Passenger Van is a familiar sight on the road, renowned for its dependability and spacious interior. It comfortably seats up to 15 passengers, making it a favorite for hotels, shuttle services, and the tourism industry. While its design lacks the modern flair of newer rivals, the Express prioritizes function over form. Its large interior is simple yet durable, built to withstand years of heavy use. Chevrolet offers a variety of engine options, including a fuel-efficient turbodiesel, ensuring there's a powertrain to suit most needs. However, the Express is starting to show its age. It lacks many driver-assistance features and infotainment options that have become commonplace. Additionally, its large size can be cumbersome in tight spaces. Nevertheless, when maximum passenger capacity and cargo room are paramount, the Express remains a compelling choice. Competitors include the [Ford Transit Passenger Wagon](/ford/transit-passenger-wagon/), [Mercedes-Benz Sprinter Passenger Van](/mercedes-benz/sprinter-passenger-van/), and [Ram ProMaster Window Van](/ram/promaster-window-van/).

Model:TW9kZWwtMTE1MzA=.overview: The 2024 Chevrolet Express Passenger Van has been around for almost three decades with minimal changes, yet it remains a preferred choice for shuttle companies, comfortably transporting up to 15 passengers and their cargo.

editorial({\"section\":\"VERDICT\"}).text: The Chevrolet Express Passenger Van prioritizes space and durability over cutting-edge tech. Despite its age, it remains a popular choice for businesses needing to transport large groups, offering comfortable seating for up to 15 passengers and a powerful engine lineup.

editorial({\"section\":\"PROS\"}).title: Pros
editorial({\"section\":\"PROS\"}).text: Unmatched Passenger Capacity. Robust build quality. Impressive towing capacity.

editorial({\"section\":\"CONS\"}).title: Cons
editorial({\"section\":\"CONS\"}).text: Due for an Update. Falls short in fuel efficiency. No All-Wheel-Drive Option.

Model:TW9kZWwtMTE1MjU=.name: Express Cargo Van

editorial({\"section\":\"OVERVIEW\"}).text:
One of the most impressive things about the Chevrolet Express Cargo Van is its longevity. Though it hasn't changed much in almost 30 years, the Express has remained a strong seller for Chevy, a work vehicle that's tough as nails and can haul or tow virtually anything that gets thrown its way. However, its age has caught up with it, and modern rivals have sprung up with more power, comfort, and technology.

The Express Cargo Van is a van of another era, and Chevy likes it that way. Its design hasn't changed much since the 1990s. You won't find an infotainment system, Apple CarPlay, heated seats, or automatic climate control here. The [Ford Transit Cargo Van](/ford/transit-cargo-van/) and [Mercedes-Benz Sprinter](/mercedes-benz/sprinter-cargo-van/) are more expensive, but both have far more technology and feel more engaging to drive. Meanwhile, with its aging ladder-frame platform, the Express drives like a work truck. Its ride isn't the most compliant, handling feels cumbersome sometimes, and fuel economy is near the bottom of the segment.

But most customers needing a tough van that can handle hard work aren't looking for something refined or luxurious; they just need something that works. The Express Cargo Van fits the bill, with a straightforward design that's easy for anyone to operate and has a vast market of affordable replacement parts.

Model:TW9kZWwtMTE1MjU=.overview: The Chevrolet Express Cargo Van hasn't changed much in two decades, but its dependability and readily available replacement parts make it an enduring work vehicle.

editorial({\"section\":\"VERDICT\"}).text: The Chevrolet Express Cargo Van hasn't changed much in almost three decades, but its renowned dependability, exceptional towing strength, and readily available replacement parts make it an enduring work vehicle.

editorial({\"section\":\"PROS\"}).title: Pros
editorial({\"section\":\"PROS\"}).text: Proven durability. Best-in-class towing capacity. Vast cargo space. Replacement parts are affordable and easy to find.

editorial({\"section\":\"CONS\"}).title: Cons
editorial({\"section\":\"CONS\"}).text: Subpar gas mileage. Few body style configurations. Decades-old design feels its age.

Model:TW9kZWwtMTE1MjY=.name: Savana Cargo Van
Model:TW9kZWwtMTE1MjY=.overview: While it may not be the most modern option in its category, the 2024 GMC Savana Cargo Van stands as a testament to the robustness and substantial hauling capacity required in the full-size work vehicle.
